docs.snippet: The women in Donald Trump’s life have sharply different roles. That difference is what many other men want, too....
docs.lead_paragraph: The women in Donald Trump’s life have sharply different roles. That difference is what many other men want, too.
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by attorney and journalist Jill Filipovic observes that Donald Trump's family values are perversely traditional, in that he wants dedicated domesticity from his wives but modern professional success for his daughters; suggests one of main questions of election is whether society has evolved enough to judge women as individuals rather than through their relationships to men.

headline.main: Why Men Want to Marry Melanias and Raise Ivankas

docs.snippet: Ranchers near the Mexican border see smugglers and sometimes find bodies, but they favor a different approach to illegal immigration from Donald J. Trump’s wall....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ranchers near the Mexican border see smugglers and sometimes find bodies, but they favor a different approach to illegal immigration from Donald J. Trump’s wall.
docs.abstract: Dan Barry This Land column examines threat of drug smuggling and illegal immigrants faced by ranchers along Arizona's border with Mexico, who also share conviction that Donald Trump's proposed wall would fail as deterrent; ranchers' proposed solution of round-the-clock patrols is overshadowed by doubts that situation can change.

headline.main: Migrants and Smugglers Won’t Be Stopped by Donald Trump’s Wall, Ranchers Say
headline.print_headline: Ranchers Say Wall Won’t Help Chaos at Border

docs.snippet: Four days in Cleveland distilled the essential features of the Trump phenomenon....
docs.lead_paragraph: Four days in Cleveland distilled the essential features of the Trump phenomenon.
docs.abstract: Ross Douthat Op-Ed column argues Republican National Convention was perfect synecdoche for Donald Trump's entire ascent to apex of Republican Party; underscores how unique Trump's speech at convention was, and degree to which its underlying message of resentment and anger will survive long after current campaign is over.
